subsection_analysis.refined_text: an interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in . click here for more information . if you have a question, please contact us .

• Interactive forms: These contain fields that you can select and fill in. • Flat forms: These do not have interactive fields. You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures.

Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro) You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill & Sign tools. Interactive form To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms.
